title: Is it RIYA if I show off in my study, career, car, skills, or other worldly things
transcript:
[Questioner] from the Emirates Sheikh I get 
continuous Whisper of having showing off while   studying like even when a teacher teaches some 
students and they answer a question I get wiswas   that no no I may be having Pride uh I may be 
answering to show off like that I'm like I'm   better than someone like answering a question 
stuff like that besides that corrupted my mind   so much so much uh that I cannot even concentrate 
properly in studies this is not showing off this   is not riya there's nothing wrong in showing off 
my new car or showing off my ability to Sprint a   hundred meters in um half an hour this is how fast 
I go um there's no riya in showing off or flexing   my muscles these are worldly matters riya is 
related to Islam when you show off by prolonging   your prayer or showing off by giving sadaqah and 
telling everybody like look I did this and that   when you show off by going around people knocking 
on their doors and saying oh today is Monday I'm   fasting by the way this is showing off which 
is um blame blames worthy and Allah Knows Best and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All
